summary: An Upstate New York family is torn apart during the American Civil War.
cast: François Arnaud|Lucy Boynton|Casey Thomas Brown|Billy Campbell|Mary Fay Coady|Josh Cruddas|Ryan Doucette|Brian Downey|Ryan Drost|Rod Ernest|Peter Fonda|Scott Horton|Brian Jamieson|Walter Learning|Stephen LeBail|Daniel Lillford|Angus Macfadyen|Ciarán MacGillivray|Wally MacKinnon|Colm Magner|Andrea Lee Norwood|Robbie O'Neill|Scott Owen|Augustus Prew|Arnold Rafuse|Charlie Rhindress|Elizabeth Richardson|Geneviève Steele|Hugh Thompson|Zach Tovey
director: Director: Ron Maxwell (as Ronald F. Maxwell)
title: Copperhead
